name: Lights (itch) (Himmi66)
description:
A solo-project puzzle platformer game I made for the GMI December 2022 Game Jam.

I started out with some unformed but amazing new concepts in mind but they became impossible to work out, oh how did it end up like this!?

I guess that's how GameJam'ing works out!

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move around.

Use SPACEBAR to drop a light that you might have picked up.

Background tiles by SpinachChicken.

Music by: Jordan Ottesen (jottesen.itch.io)

SFX by: omegaosg.itch.io

Rest by me.

I hope that you enjoy it.

Happy Holidays.
